Better and more challenging than its predecessor, Portal 2 does what it does best even better. 

The humor continues to deliver funny lines with excellent timing, the story progresses well along with the puzzles and vice-versa, delivering more challenge in the sense it plays much more around your spatial awareness than the first one, with bigger levels and new interesting elements that allow more creativity in the problem solving.

It also seems I've discovered the "origin" of another meme that I had no idea this game had a part in taking it to the next level. No wonder the Portal series has the praise it has and it's deserving of it for all these reasons. Maybe more.

If you like to spend your free time having fun problem solving and haven't tried these series yet, please start with Portal then this one. It will be worth the time.

And yes, just played this now and I'm not ashamed of it.
I loved this game, it's a really cool and sometimes cute puzzle game. I'm not a quiet pacient person and i really enjoyed this game and had tons of fun ! I highly recommend it.
Simply amazing. Great story, great gameplay. Valve make Portal 3! :)
I enjoyed this game very much and recommend it to anyone who enjoys puzzle games
10/10 would play again, story very nice with awesome soundtrack.
Great game!! Online community makes some very challenging levels and the single player/ coop is fun as well. Its been almost 2 years since i bought it and still think its worth my money.

Actually one of the best games out there. EVER. I cant tell you how many times I have completed this game. I just keep on coming back to it and I most likely still will! I cannot wait for the day for when Portal 3 comes out (If it ever does) but If you do not have this game in your steam libary then stop reading this and go buy it!
its fun

Recently, I had the opportunity to play and finish this game. A lot of my friends like this game very much and recommend it. As for me, I found just a few puzzles interesting and difficult, but a lot of them are boring... Maybe in 2011, it was wow-gameplay!

An absolute masterpiece of gameplay. With great writing and humor as well, Portal 2 is one of the best games Iâ€™ve ever played. The mechanics of using your portals to solve puzzles is challenging and rewarding, and the level design complements this spectacularly. On top of this, the atmosphere and music perfectly fit the type of style and gameplay this game has to offer. The gameâ€™s dialogue also offers great humor and jokes, and GLaDOS is one of the most entertaining characters to listen to. The co-op is also great, with its own separate story and everything. On top of this, there's also player made levels if you run out of game to play. So that way, you can always play new and interesting levels. I strongly recommend this game to anyone who likes a good puzzle and amazing gameplay. If you want a great single-player experience, you wonâ€™t find much better than this. 10/10
Mega Geil ^^

This game is better than the original which was a masterpiece on it's own. This one is well ahead of it's time and EVERY HUMAN BEING SHOULD EXPERIENCE THIS! You can buy the portal bundle for the previous game (Necessary for story) and save 5 USD too.

Story: 10/10
Graphics (for it's time): 10/10
Gameplay: Simple but still great thus, 10/10

Overall: 10/10

Buen juego. Contiene una buena historia y es muy atrapante. Los personajes son 10/10, la historia se termina en unas horas pero vale la pena el precio.
En cuanto al multijugador cooperativo y las camaras descargables, son muy buenos, los dialogos son correctos y el desenvolvimiento de P-Body y Atlas son excelentes. Excelente juego. Si vale la pena el precio.
Nicc

Great game, it's funny and challenging, and the ever-present feeling of resignation for GLaDOS, the passive-aggressive robot always antagonizing you will drive you nuts! If you're looking for fun, you've found it. Great humor, and I guarantee that at some point, you WILL laugh!

Edit: I wrote the beginning of this comment years ago, when I was still young and naive. Now that I am older, I can provide a more elaborate review. The attention to detail in this game is astounding, references to different games and Portal 1 are everywhere. The puzzles are fun yet challenging enough to drive you mad with desperation if you can't seem to find the solution. The dialogue is awesomely hilarious, GLADoS is much more refined, and Wheatley is just great. The storyline is great, as is the ending. You will walk away from this game feeling accomplished, and you can't help but laugh at the awesome story this game has produced. So yes, 10/10, I would recommend to anybody looking for a good time.

[h1] Resumen:	[/h1]
Si te gustÃ³ el Portal, pero te supo a poco, aquÃ­ tienes su secuela muy mejorada. Esta historia se queda donde la anterior y nos cuenta que ocurriÃ³ con GLaDOS, que le pasÃ³ a nuestra protagonista y obviamente que habrÃ¡ mucho mÃ¡s puzles con portales. 

[h1] Pros:	[/h1]
[list]
[*]Mejores puzles que su precuela. Este Portal 2 es mÃ¡s difÃ­cil que el anterior y sus puzles son mÃ¡s largos y mÃ¡s frenÃ©ticos, donde sacamos el mayor provecho a la pistola de portales.
[*]Una historia mucho mÃ¡s profunda y mÃ¡s larga. El anterior Portal duraba lo que te tardas en fumar un canuto, apenas daba tiempo a saborearlo, pero Valve aprendiÃ³ la lecciÃ³n y lo hizo no sÃ³lo mÃ¡s largo, sino mÃ¡s rico en historia. AquÃ­ podemos conocer el pasado no sÃ³lo de Aperture Science, si no de la mismÃ­sima GLaDOS, y joder, GLaDOS mola.
[*]Un final cojonudo. Si aÃºn no sabes como termina este juego, pÃ¡satelo, con ese final se te van a caer los cojones al suelo... O los ovarios XD. 
[/list]

[h1] Contras:	[/h1]
[list]
[*]Un villano indefinido y confuso. En el anterior Portal este era un punto positivo, pero en este no puedo decir lo mismo. [Spoiler] Wheatley me parece un personaje estÃºpido, demasiado risitas y que no estÃ¡ a la altura como villano de la genial GLaDOS de la primera entrega. Y si os digo la verdad no me ha terminado de convencer mucho eso de que pongan a GLaDOS al final como la "buena". Eso sÃ­, el primer tramo de la historia con GLaDOS rencorosa por haberla matado, me parece magnÃ­fico. [/Spoiler]
[*]En el anterior juego ya me quejÃ© de que se pasa demasiado tiempo cargando... Pero en este es todavÃ­a peor... Los tiempos de carga me parecen excesivos, y te quitan todo el hype para pasarte la siguiente prueba.
[*]Creo que esto es problema de Win10, pero a mÃ­ en muchas ocasiones me daba tirones y bajadas de FPS, haciendo que se cortase el audio o se congelase la imagen durante unos microsegundos. Y no, no es problema de hardware porque me funcionan a la perfecciÃ³n juegos actuales.
[/list] 

[h1] AnÃ¡lisis:	[/h1]
Que decir, este es un Portal mejorado hasta el infinito y mÃ¡s allÃ¡... Es una pena que Valve no haya seguido sacando juegos como estos, porque merecen y mucho la pena. Personalmente me parecen dos juegos que todo amante de los videojuegos deberÃ­a probar. Y aunque parezcan bÃ¡sicos, tienen un toque que los distingue y una historia simple, pero que atrae. 

[h1] Nota:	[/h1]

portal 2. one of, if not, my all time favorite game. the humor used is unparalel in any other game ive seen. the story is deep, the humor is amazing, and the puzzels are chalanging. if you have not played portal 2 or portal 2 co-op then you are wasting your life. now for the ACTUAL reveiw. the graphics are bad for todays standards but five times better than the original portal game. spec wise, it will run on most computers and the co-op can go cross platform on PC, Xbox and PS3/4. a mikerophone is also unessesary as you can configure an open mike in game. the co-op is very smooth and easy to comunicate through and the single player is amazing. the added mod for portal 2, portal stories mel, is free for owners of portal 2. portal stories mel adds so much to the story of apature labs, although difficult, it is a whole game on its own. i think ive covered pretty much everything in portal 2. 11 out of 10 stars.
-frazzy

A great sequel to the first game, I'd even say it was better than the first game. The graphics are amazing, and the tests are more challenging and overall a great puzzle to complete.
